data.message: Sherly Sandburge, is there any u can contact me on a promblem i have concerning , people who are suppose to be on your staff.I've been texing one who was useing the name of Anastasi Marie, which is to be Sheryl Sandburge. She was in the hospital awhile back , now i am being told she's going to have surgery. Are u going to surgery? Another lady by the name of Galvin Navanit has said u were her boss. And i have won abounch of money, Please if u will contact me here on face book messenger. If u are the right Sheryl u have my #no.thank u so much

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Henry. You can confirm that you’ve been contacted by a Facebook representative by asking them to send you an email. Facebook representatives will have an @sales.fb.com, @support.facebook.com or @fb.com email address. All 3 email addresses are valid and only originate from authorized representatives of Facebook. Let us know if there’s anything else we can help you with. -Jessica
Thank u. Have a blessed day
